00139 /*  BIT Registers  */
00140 
00141 /*  TCON  0x88 */
00142 sbit TF1 = TCON ^ 7;            /* TIMER 1 OVERFLOW FLAG      */
00143 sbit TR1 = TCON ^ 6;            /* TIMER 1 ON/OFF CONTROL     */
00144 sbit TF0 = TCON ^ 5;            /* TIMER 0 OVERFLOW FLAG      */
00145 sbit TR0 = TCON ^ 4;            /* TIMER 0 ON/OFF CONTROL     */
00146 sbit IE1 = TCON ^ 3;            /* EXT. INTERRUPT 1 EDGE FLAG */
00147 sbit IT1 = TCON ^ 2;            /* EXT. INTERRUPT 1 TYPE      */
00148 sbit IE0 = TCON ^ 1;            /* EXT. INTERRUPT 0 EDGE FLAG */
00149 sbit IT0 = TCON ^ 0;            /* EXT. INTERRUPT 0 TYPE      */
00150 
00151 /*  SCON0  0x98 */
00152 sbit SM00 = SCON0 ^ 7;          /* SERIAL MODE CONTROL BIT 0           */
00153 sbit SM10 = SCON0 ^ 6;          /* SERIAL MODE CONTROL BIT 1           */
00154 sbit SM20 = SCON0 ^ 5;          /* MULTIPROCESSOR COMMUNICATION ENABLE */
00155 sbit REN0 = SCON0 ^ 4;          /* RECEIVE ENABLE                      */
00156 sbit TB80 = SCON0 ^ 3;          /* TRANSMIT BIT 8                      */
00157 sbit RB80 = SCON0 ^ 2;          /* RECEIVE BIT 8                       */
00158 sbit TI0 = SCON0 ^ 1;           /* TRANSMIT INTERRUPT FLAG             */
00159 sbit RI0 = SCON0 ^ 0;           /* RECEIVE INTERRUPT FLAG              */
00160 
00161 /*  IE  0xA8 */
00162 sbit EA = IE ^ 7;               /* GLOBAL INTERRUPT ENABLE      */
00163 sbit ET2 = IE ^ 5;              /* TIMER 2 INTERRUPT ENABLE     */
00164 sbit ES0 = IE ^ 4;              /* UART0 INTERRUPT ENABLE       */
00165 sbit ET1 = IE ^ 3;              /* TIMER 1 INTERRUPT ENABLE     */
00166 sbit EX1 = IE ^ 2;              /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 1 ENABLE  */
00167 sbit ET0 = IE ^ 1;              /* TIMER 0 INTERRUPT ENABLE     */
00168 sbit EX0 = IE ^ 0;              /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 0 ENABLE  */
00169 
00170 /*  IP  0xB8 */
00171 sbit PT2 = IP ^ 5;              /* TIMER 2 PRIORITY                                 */
00172 sbit PS = IP ^ 4;               /* SERIAL PORT PRIORITY                             */
00173 sbit PT1 = IP ^ 3;              /* TIMER 1 PRIORITY                                 */
00174 sbit PX1 = IP ^ 2;              /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 1 PRIORITY    */
00175 sbit PT0 = IP ^ 1;              /* TIMER 0 PRIORITY                                 */
00176 sbit PX0 = IP ^ 0;              /* EXTERNAL INTERRUPT 0 PRIORITY    */
00177 
00178 /* SMB0CN 0xC0 */
00179 sbit BUSY = SMB0CN ^ 7;         /* SMBUS 0 BUSY                    */
00180 sbit ENSMB = SMB0CN ^ 6;        /* SMBUS 0 ENABLE                  */
00181 sbit STA = SMB0CN ^ 5;          /* SMBUS 0 START FLAG              */
00182 sbit STO = SMB0CN ^ 4;          /* SMBUS 0 STOP FLAG               */
00183 sbit SI = SMB0CN ^ 3;           /* SMBUS 0 INTERRUPT PENDING FLAG  */
00184 sbit AA = SMB0CN ^ 2;           /* SMBUS 0 ASSERT/ACKNOWLEDGE FLAG */
00185 sbit SMBFTE = SMB0CN ^ 1;       /* SMBUS 0 FREE TIMER ENABLE       */
00186 sbit SMBTOE = SMB0CN ^ 0;       /* SMBUS 0 TIMEOUT ENABLE          */
00187 
00188 /*  T2CON  0xC8 */
00189 sbit TF2 = T2CON ^ 7;           /* TIMER 2 OVERFLOW FLAG        */
00190 sbit EXF2 = T2CON ^ 6;          /* EXTERNAL FLAG                */
00191 sbit RCLK0 = T2CON ^ 5;         /* UART0 RX CLOCK SOURCE        */
00192 sbit TCLK0 = T2CON ^ 4;         /* UART0 TX CLOCK SOURCE        */
00193 sbit EXEN2 = T2CON ^ 3;         /* TIMER 2 EXTERNAL ENABLE FLAG */
00194 sbit TR2 = T2CON ^ 2;           /* TIMER 2 ON/OFF CONTROL       */
00195 sbit CT2 = T2CON ^ 1;           /* TIMER OR COUNTER SELECT      */
00196 sbit CPRL2 = T2CON ^ 0;         /* CAPTURE OR RELOAD SELECT     */
00197 
00198 /*  PSW  */
00199 sbit CY = PSW ^ 7;              /* CARRY FLAG              */
00200 sbit AC = PSW ^ 6;              /* AUXILIARY CARRY FLAG    */
00201 sbit F0 = PSW ^ 5;              /* USER FLAG 0             */
00202 sbit RS1 = PSW ^ 4;             /* REGISTER BANK SELECT 1  */
00203 sbit RS0 = PSW ^ 3;             /* REGISTER BANK SELECT 0  */
00204 sbit OV = PSW ^ 2;              /* OVERFLOW FLAG           */
00205 sbit F1 = PSW ^ 1;              /* USER FLAG 1             */
00206 sbit P = PSW ^ 0;               /* ACCUMULATOR PARITY FLAG */
00207 
00208 /* PCA0CN D8H */
00209 sbit CF = PCA0CN ^ 7;           /* PCA 0 COUNTER OVERFLOW FLAG   */
00210 sbit CR = PCA0CN ^ 6;           /* PCA 0 COUNTER RUN CONTROL BIT */
00211 sbit CCF4 = PCA0CN ^ 4;         /* PCA 0 MODULE 4 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00212 sbit CCF3 = PCA0CN ^ 3;         /* PCA 0 MODULE 3 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00213 sbit CCF2 = PCA0CN ^ 2;         /* PCA 0 MODULE 2 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00214 sbit CCF1 = PCA0CN ^ 1;         /* PCA 0 MODULE 1 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00215 sbit CCF0 = PCA0CN ^ 0;         /* PCA 0 MODULE 0 INTERRUPT FLAG */
00216 
00217 /* ADC0CN E8H */
00218 sbit AD0EN = ADC0CN ^ 7;        /* ADC 0 ENABLE                              */
00219 sbit AD0TM = ADC0CN ^ 6;        /* ADC 0 TRACK MODE                          */
00220 sbit AD0INT = ADC0CN ^ 5;       /* ADC 0 CONVERISION COMPLETE INTERRUPT FLAG */
00221 sbit AD0BUSY = ADC0CN ^ 4;      /* ADC 0 BUSY FLAG                           */
00222 sbit AD0CM1 = ADC0CN ^ 3;       /* ADC 0 START OF CONVERSION MODE BIT 1      */
00223 sbit AD0CM0 = ADC0CN ^ 2;       /* ADC 0 START OF CONVERSION MODE BIT 0      */
00224 sbit AD0WINT = ADC0CN ^ 1;      /* ADC 0 WINDOW COMPARE INTERRUPT FLAG       */
00225 sbit AD0LJST = ADC0CN ^ 0;      /* ADC 0 RIGHT JUSTIFY DATA BIT              */

00232 sbit TXBSY = SPI0CN ^ 3;        /* SPI 0 TX BUSY FLAG                       */
00233 sbit SLVSEL = SPI0CN ^ 2;       /* SPI 0 SLAVE SELECT                       */
00234 sbit MSTEN = SPI0CN ^ 1;        /* SPI 0 MASTER ENABLE                      */
00235 sbit SPIEN = SPI0CN ^ 0;        /* SPI 0 SPI ENABLE                         */
